page.title: 12The Fire Service in K.Lynn
page.content: King's Lynn fire station is situated on the A1078.The operational firemen are divided into four watches(Red, White,Blue and Green).There are twelve men on each watch and they work two shifts:days 9am.-6pm.,nights 6pm.-9am. The firecrew on duty are supplemented by nine retained firemen at King's Lynn. There are three fire appliances(two water tenders and one water tender ladder)and three special appliances (a rescue tender,salvage tender and the hydraulic platform). King's Lynn is the Divisional HQ.of B. Division which covers one third of Norfolk. The area covered is approximately a twelve mile radius.The villages around the Division are covered by the Retained Fire stations,which are maintained by part time firemen.
